The all-in-one, AI-powered platform that brings learning, skills, and comms together to upskill your team faster.
Get a demo
Loved by teams
like yours.
Features
Everything you need in one platform
Thrive is packed full of features that we know you'll love.
Get a demo
Learning management
Audio, PDFs, pathways, quizzes, and so much more let your learners thrive in styles that suit them.
Analytics & reporting
Keep track of all your data, trends and learner behaviour with our industry leading analytics & reporting features
Create learning content instantly, consult an AI WhatsApp Coach for answers, and surface answers instantly with AI Search.
Mobile App
All of your learning, anytime, anywhere: Whether they're on the shop floor or commuting to work, your people can access the answers they need.
Social learning
All of the benefits of an LXP inside an LMS. Thrive's social learning features put the power back into the hands of your users, empowering them to share their knowledge.
View all features
Solutions
No matter your learning challenge, we have the solution
Whether you're looking to increase sales, encourage a self-led learning culture, or ensure company compliance, Thrive has a track record of success.
Explore solutions
Onboarding
Onboard staff faster than ever, regardless of their location. Utilise tailored learning pathways, guides, and an easy-to-use intuitive interface.
Compliance training
Ensure workplace compliance. Automate essential learning, assign tasks, and receive real-time progress updates.
Communication
Increase communication and unite your team. Deliver updates via activity feeds, real-time announcements, and connect staff with internal mentors.
Skills development
With our tailored skill development paths, you can train an entire team on a new product or identify individual skill gaps and address them effectively.
Sales enablement
Drive stronger sales perfomance with personalised learning paths, gamification features, interactive content, and real-time analytics.

integrations
Connected in every way to your current workflow
Learn more
FAQS
All your answers upfront
Can Thrive replace my LMS?
Thrive has replaced hundreds of traditional LMSs migrating customers from Learning Pool, Kallidus, SAP Litmos, Looop, Totara, Fuse, Cornerstone and so many more. Our modern-day learning platform combines all the compliance requirements of the traditional LMS with features such as AI-powered personalisation, user-generated content, comms, skills and a social media-like user experience. However, we understand sometimes a platform can be very embedded into your organisation. Although it performs best alone, Thrive can be plugged over the top of an existing LMS, ensuring you can still give your learners that stellar, modern learning experience.
What languages does Thrive support?
Thrive auto-detects language preferences and is available in 20+ different languages including English, German, French, Dutch, Italian, Spanish, Swedish and many more.
Does Thrive have a mobile app?
Yes! Not only is Thrive completely responsive, but we also have a mobile app which enables front line employees to make the best use of the platform wherever they work. Download this on the App Store or Google Play Store.
What other LMS Platforms can you migrate from?
We can migrate from any LMS, LXP or learning platform youâre using. As long as we have cooperation from your current provider and you have the right agreement in place for us to access and transfer your data over, we can do it.
What formats of content can you migrate?
We can migrate any of your below content formats: E-Learning (SCORM 1.2, SCORM 2004, TinCan, xAPI, CMI5) Word processor files (.pdf) Video files (.mp4, .mpg, .wmv, .avi, .mov, .webm) Image files (.png, .jpg, .gif, .svg) Articles Links

An LMS engineered for enterprise
With a back end fine-tuned for admins and a front end to rival Instagram, Thrive is the marketâs number one emerging enterprise-ready LMS.
Hundreds of companies.
99% customer retention.
Customer experience
Success starts with a secure and stable solution
Trusted by global organisations in over 60 countries such as Volvo, Vodafone, Sysco, Frasers Group and more, Thrive is the secure and scalable solution that already serves millions of users and languages around the world.Â
Hosted with AWS, the world's most comprehensive and recognised cloud technology, and powered by AI, our learning platform is completely secure and excels in performance - crunching endless data points with an impressive uptime of 99.9999%.
Level up your learning culture with confidence
LMS migration
No task is too big
No matter what traditional LMS youâre using, weâre experienced in helping large enterprise organisations with multi-lingual requirements migrate from their existing solution.
Implement at scale
No complex configuration needed
Unlike traditional platforms, Thrive requires no technical development or complex configuration to customise. The admin experience is user-friendly, seamless, and ready to go.
Support
24-hour, global support
With 99% customer satisfaction, 99% first response rate, and 98% containment, our support team are always on hand, responsive and would never leave you to fend for yourself.
Customer Success
Cutting-edge customer experience
Team up with talented experts who understand creative campaigns, build better engagement, and are proactive about turning your product needs into reality.

Integrations
Connect your tools and tech

FAQS
All your answers upfront
How do I get in touch with your Security Team?
To contact our Information Security Team, email
[email protected]
Where are your data centres?
Our platform is hosted and managed within Amazonâs secure data centres using Amazon Web Services (AWS). This allows us to extend their exceptional compliance program to our clients, including: SOC 1/ISAE 3402, SOC 2, SOC 3 FISMA, DIACAP, and FedRAMP PCI DSS Level 1 ISO 9001, ISO 27001, ISO 27017, ISO 27018
How do you ensure data protection?
With the help of industry experts and regular internal assessments, we ensure compliance with all relevant global data protection legislation. Keeping up to date with any changes to make it as easy as possible for our customers to fulfil their obligations when using our system.
What information security policies and certifications do you hold?
The security of our customerâs data is a top priority at Thrive, considered at all stages of business. We have a dedicated team devoted to the continuous improvement and monitoring of our security posture. Weâre proud to be ISO27001 certified since 2019 as proof of our ongoing commitment to the protection of our customers.
What formats of content can you migrate?
We can migrate any of your below content formats: E-Learning (SCORM 1.2, SCORM 2004, TinCan, xAPI, CMI5) Word processor files (.pdf) Video files (.mp4, .mpg, .wmv, .avi, .mov, .webm) Image files (.png, .jpg, .gif, .svg) Articles Links
What formats do you need the data in to migrate?
The metadata required alongside the files would be: Unique Identifier File name Content Title (3 - 100 characters) Description (Up to 1000 characters) publishedAt (Date) Language (if applicable.) File name is important and can be used as the ID between the file and the metadata.
What other LMS Platforms can you migrate from?
We can migrate from any LMS, LXP or learning platform youâre using. As long as we have cooperation from your current provider and you have the right agreement in place for us to access and transfer your data over, we can do it.
Does Thrive have a mobile app?
Yes! Not only is Thrive completely responsive, but we also have a mobile app which enables front line employees to make the best use of the platform wherever they work. Download this on the App Store or Google Play Store.
Do you support single-sign-on (SSO) and integrations?
Yes, single-sign-on comes as standard with Thrive giving your learners a seamless log-in experience and we also support non-email users. For integrations, we support the following standards for integrations of various kinds: SAML2, SCIM2, xAPI and SCORM 1.2. Alongside these, we offer a webhook interface for performing various actions and a RESTful API for querying data on the system. This gives you the freedom to integrate a variety of tools such as HR systems, CRMs, data analysis tools and comms tools such as Teams and Slack.
What languages does Thrive support?
Thrive auto-detects language preferences and is available in 20+ different languages including English, German, French, Dutch, Italian, Spanish, Swedish and many more.
How long does it take to migrate and implement?
The time it takes to complete migration and onboarding depends on your involvement and speed in which we can access the data from your current platform. We typically see companies who are focused complete the transition within two and a half months but others may take longer depending on your migration and implementation approach. Fun fact: Our quickest implementation has been 30 days and the longest 126 days!
What content types does Thrive support?
SCORM, PDFs, MP3, webpages, MP4, YouTube, web-links, questions, articles, quizzes, broadcasts and so much more.
Can Thrive replace my LMS?
Thrive has replaced hundreds of traditional LMSs migrating customers from Learning Pool, Kallidus, SAP Litmos, Looop, Totara, Fuse, Cornerstone and so many more. Our modern-day learning platform combines all the compliance requirements of the traditional LMS with features such as AI-powered personalisation, user-generated content, comms, skills and a social media-like user experience. However, we understand sometimes a platform can be very embedded into your organisation. Although it performs best alone, Thrive can be plugged over the top of an existing LMS, ensuring you can still give your learners that stellar, modern learning experience.

LMS features
From compliance management and social learning through to analytics and skills, Thrive has all the LMS features you need to help achieve your learning goals.Â
Features
Everything you need in one platform.
With Thrive, itâs easy to create and curate relevant content, manage and progress skills, track performance with analytics, and integrate your entire tech stack.
AI-powered learning
Thrive AI surfaces learning opportunities and content creation with AI tools for instant upskilling.
Explore Thrive's AI features
Thrive AI
Authoring tool
Use simple prompts to instantly generate comprehensive learning content at the click of a button.
Thrive AI
Whatsapp Coach
Empower your users with Â answers they need no matter where they are, easily accessed via our Whatsapp coach.
Thrive AI
Dynamic Search
Provide your team with exactly the knowledge theyâre looking for, surfacing totally personalised and instant answers via our sophisticated search feature.
Compliance management
Keep on top of your companyâs compliance training, from initial assignment all the way through to ensuring completion.
Analytics & reporting
Listen to the data, and find out the story itâs telling you with Thriveâs robust Analytics and Reporting feature.
User management
With Thrive's User Management, you can make sure your learning content always reaches its intended audience.
Communication
Good communication is the foundation of any successful team, and Thrive makes it easier than ever for people to connect.
Social learning
With the learner-led functionality of an LXP, Social Learning is at the heart of Thrive putting your people first.
Learning content
Cater to the ways your teams learn the best. Our easy-to-use content creation tools mean Thrive supports a range of content formats and everyone can get involved sharing knowledge.
Skills & goals
Help your learners reach their full potential with Skills and Goals, and track their path to success.
Gamification
Fuel your learnersâ drive with Thriveâs Gamification feature, sparking friendly competition and rewarding their achievements.
Localisation
Don't let your learning get lost in translation. Ensure your people get the message, no matter where they are.
Events
Thrive's Events feature unites teams virtually. Share training and comms within the platform, keeping everyone informed.
Mobile app
Training doesn't just take place at a desk. Let your team take their learning anywhere with Thrive's accessible mobile app.
User experience
The Thrive app mirrors the intuitive feel of social media, so nothing stands between your users and their learning.
integrations
Connected in every way to sync into your current workflow

Professional Services
Our expertise. Your success!
From set-up to support to success, our strategic services and expert team are by your side all the way.
Book a demo
What you get
From implementation through to customer success and optimisation, our world-class team will be on hand every step of the way to assist you in getting the most out of Thrive.
Whether itâs making use of our migration services, health check recommendations and learning strategy sessions as part of your annual subscription, or harnessing our One-Time Services such as your very own Dedicated Support Representative or Learning Administrator, you can tap into our expertise and people power, exactly when you need it.
Whatâs included in your
Professional Services subscription?
Every business is different, so your level of service is determined by your own unique needs.
To make it easy, weâve simplified how our team of fast-thinkers, problem-solvers and go-getters are going to be by your side in this breakdown of activities.

Your winning start
An LMS implementation service that will jump start your success
95% of customers rate their
implementation journey as
exceptional
From kick-off to launchÂ Â
Our team of Implementation Specialists are obsessed with creating an onboarding experience that will make your launch one to remember. Your project team will be totally immersed Â throughout the process â from pre-sales, to kick-off, to launch â to ensure you have all the tools, knowledge and ideas to bring your learning strategy and Thrive vision to life.
Launching your LMS with complete confidence
Project planning isnât to be underestimated. You want to deliver your LMS to your business on time, and with complete confidence that itâs going to exceed expectations. Our team of Project Managers help us stay on track, bring stakeholders together, deliver on relevant outcomes and drive the implementation forward - avoiding any delay along the way!
Your implementation journey - week by week
Setting you up for successÂ Â
As part of your onboarding youâll receive a series of workshops covering key topics from skills strategy to content planning, a range of resources and how-to style videos should you need any training explainers - although one of the best parts of Thrive is itâs so intuitive, anyone can pick it up and get going. Lastly, access to our customer community, Thrive Tribe, where you can ask questions, share ideas and tap into the experiences of other users.
EnsuringÂ continued performance
Working with your Customer Success Manager, you'll get support for your strategy through new ideas, and monthly reporting to evidence success. Global support for your learners and round-the-clock response times will help everyone to succeed.
What you'll get
A learning platform packed full of service
At our core is creating the industry's best customer experience, backed by 98% customer satisfaction, 99% platform renewals and 99% first-response SLA.
Onboarding workshops
A series of immersive workshops covering content strategy, campaigns, success, launch and more.
Implementation Specialist
A dedicated Implementation Specialist to guide you through everything from onboarding to launch.
24-hour support
Our global support team has a 21% higher than industry average response rate and is there for you round-the-clock, even on live chat.
Customer Success Manager
Your go-to person to spark new ideas, support your strategy and evidence success through monthly reporting.
Full migrationÂ
Our LMS migration tool that takes your users, completion history and content directly from your current learning platform and imports them into Thrive.
Meet the teamÂ
Decades of experienceÂ
Working alongside you is a team of Implementation Specialists with years of experience in the industry. They spend their days hosting workshops, configuring learning experiences and setting you up for future success.

Thrive Impact
Your data, campaigns and project team that sets out to evidence real business success.
Watch video
Three new recruits for the price of one.
Weâll spend time helping you set and prioritise your learning goals where we encourage all our customers to think impact-first. Hosting workshops to brainstorm ideas and initiatives, together weâll identify and scope out your first project thatâs full of activity and A/B tests that align to your objectives.
Youâll have expert creatives on-hand to ensure your launch or campaign hits the mark with your learners. The first step to results is securing engagement. Weâll help you harness marketing know-how to really change behaviours, and of course ensure your Learning Platform always feels fresh and modern.
From there, our Data Analysts experiment and refine, using marketing assets to A/B test different variables within the project. Weâll then build out custom reports to help you keep track of progress and encourage you to bring in the data points your organisation cares about to ramp up evidence.
Lastly, weâll help you shout about your success with evidence thatâs ready to present back to your business. It can even be used as part of an
award-winning
submission that weâll write for you!
More people power for less
Test and refine - how weâll work together
Thrive Impact
is the extra people power you need to boost your learning campaigns, run projects with a test and analyse approach, and use data to deliver on the success you set.Â
Bringing in masterminds from Data, Design and Marketing for a fraction of the cost offers a cost-effective solution to take your investment to the next level.Â
Youâll get the resources to guarantee your campaigns land, the guidance to demonstrate the impact your team is having, and the evidence to showcase it right back to your business.
Your Thrive Impact journey
Ann Summers
Increased their retail sales by 30%
Keyloop
Achieved a 60% increase in goal setting
Bally's
49% reduction in cost-per-learning hour
AA
20% increase in franchise base growth
How Ann Summers evidenced sales impactÂ
Iconic retail giant Ann Summers sought to enhance customer service and product training for their 800+ retail employees. Implementing Thrive in 2022, they achieved a remarkable 98% adoption rate across the Platform, enabling consistent, measured and effective learning experiences.Â
Partnering with Thrive, they conducted an experiment focusing on key products to improve store strike rates (sales). The learning experience outperformed expectations, increasing strike rates overall from 14.8% to 23% across all regions. Their test group excelled, with a 25% strike rate 5% above targets set, showcasing the transformative impact of their blended learning programme.

FAQS
All your answers upfront
How many creative or marketing assets do I get?
Youâll be able to make use of Thrive Impactâs launch or refresh pack where youâll get the following bespoke resources every year: L&D brand identify (logo, mood boards and colour palette) 1x bespoke teaser video 1x walkthrough video 1x launch custom campaign banner 1x default brand campaign banner 4x Custom content tile templates Custom explore page images + templates Custom launch data pack - 1 month after launch. Following that youâll also be able to harness marketing resources based on your specifications for your 2x business impact focused projects per year with each aligned to one specific business goal.
How many workshops do I get a year?
One Impact workshop designed to identify the goal, the KPIs, the behaviour changes needed and the learning experiences that will drive the change and the marketing/comms strategy for this project.
How many award submissions can you help me with?
Weâll create and commission your first award submission based on the project and work we do together, then youâll be able to use that for any subsequent applications after. Weâll also help you with a powerful slide deck summarising your success to present back to your business stakeholders.
How many projects do I get a year?
Youâll receive two business-impact projects a year each aligned to a specific success metric youâre looking to prove.
Can we automate reporting?
Our in-house automation framework solves your regular reporting needs and will be built to any specification you require with a variety of delivery options and a range of schedules available. This means youâll never have to repeat your reporting requests, itâs all automated for you to track as you go.
Are there any limits to the custom reporting dashboards?
No limits, weâll work with you to create custom reports based on your reporting needs and specifications. Your bespoke dashboards will have; Multi-page, multi-source reporting, Updates and changes all included, Custom visualisations, Your company branding, Securely hosted, Two included licences.
What are some examples of projects other customers have run before?
Our Thrive Impact team has worked with the likes of Ann Summersâ to increase retail revenue, Krispy Kreme to increase production quality, The AA to increase market share of qualified instructors and Ballyâs to lower the cost-per-learning hour. Ask us about any of these case studies, weâd love to share the results and how we set up the Thrive Impact project.

Thrive AI
The platform you know and love supercharged to help your people learn better, upskill faster and get answers instantly.

Thrive AI Authoring Tool
AI-powered content authoring

Audio learning
Audio translations
Asynchronous loading
Collaborative authoring
Seamless integrations
Easily connect your learning platform with market leading products and services, ensuring a smooth and holistic learning experience.
Let WhatsApp lead you to the right knowledge
Thrive AI talks to your tech stack, and is fully integrated with the systems you know and love. Your users can use tools like WhatsApp to chat their way to the right answers in a place theyâre already working.
Book a demo
Get dynamic and instant answers
Immediate and personalised answers are non-negotiable. Thrive AI does more than just surface relevant information; itâs trained on all of your companyâs knowledge. This means your people get the most relevant, up-to-date answers, summarised in a way thatâs quick and easy to digest in the flow of work.

AI query and search
Instant answers to any question, wherever your learners are.
Totally personalised
Answers are tailored to the individual, including context about their role, location and experience.
Better understand your learning data
Never miss a trick and better understand your learners' behaviour with AI powered data analysis.
See it in action
Search analysis dashboard
Donât lose it, use it! Thrive AI gives you even deeper insights into your knowledge gaps and users' search behaviour.
AI custom reporting
Your very own AI-powered Data Analyst on-hand to build custom dashboards, answer your reporting questions, and uncover valuable insights.
Social learning made simple
Learn better together. Thrive encourages your teams to share and collaborate, with a completely new social feed that sources the most useful informal resources within your teams.
Find out more
One-click posting
Create and share simple resources and information in seconds, with a new AI-powered posting interface.
AI content moderation
Thrive AI takes the headache out of moderating content posted by your users with automated alerts for negative, false or inappropriate language and content.
AI thatâs secure and enterprise-ready
ISO 27001 Certified
Fully hosted within the Thrive private cloud
GDPR compliant, and only processed for your purposes
From our Content Authoring Tool to WhatsApp Coach and AI-powered analytics, you'll find everything you need to elevate your team's learning experience.

The only all-in-one, AI-powered learning platform
Enhance your companyâs performance with a cutting-edge platform that combines the benefits of an LMS with those of an LXP, powered by game-changing AI. Â Ditch your outdated learning processes, and build learning pathways that make an impact.
Watch video
Solutions
How Thrive can help
No matter what challenge you are trying to solve, youâll have the tools to recommend, assign, create and structure learning content for any use case.
Onboarding
Get your new starters up to speed quickly with a seamless onboarding experience thanks to our all-in-one LMS.
Learning
Take your team's learning up a gear with a comprehensive platform that combines the benefits of an LMS with those of an LXP.
Sales enablement
Equip your sales teams with an industry-leading platform that gives them the skills they need to confidently capture critical sales moments.
Compliance training
Modernise your compliance training with tailored learning pathways, module automation, and real-time reporting to help you adhere to industry standards.
Customer service training
Your customerâs success is your success. Empower your support teams to provide the best possible customer experience, every day.
Employee engagement
Unlock your team's potential with Thrive. Combine the benefits of an LXP with those of an LMS to drive greater employee engagement.
Skills development
It's time for a cutting-edge LMS that empowers your learners to proactively develop the skills necessary for both personal and team success.
Communication
Whether your employees are working from home or in the office, effortlessly deliver critical communications that connect your entire organisation.
Coaching & mentoring
Work together to set goals, share knowledge and upskill towards becoming subject matter experts faster with our coaching and mentoring solution.
Sectors
Solutions for all types of industries
Industry leaders everywhere are harnessing Thrive to drive profoundly impactful learning experiences.
Retail
Equip your front-line teams with the skills they need to increase sales, provide personalised customer service, and navigate industry shifts effectively with an all-in-one LMS that helps you onboard, train, and support staff faster than ever before.
Software
The world's fastest-growing industry deserves the world's fastest-growing LMS. Watch your business soar as you onboard staff, improve communication, and ensure compliance easier than ever before with Thrive.
Government & Public Sector
Keep your teams on top of legislation, engage dispersed workers and collaborate on the things that matter by using an all in one platform for compliance, communications and skill requirements.
Finance
Empower your organisation to seamlessly adapt to new regulatory changes and data challenges. Thrive ensures compliance, provides essential training, and develops the skills your learners need to succeed in the financial industry.
Real Estate
Foster a learning culture that helps your team succeed in every aspect of the dynamic world of real estate. From providing incredible customer service to enhancing industry knowledge, our LMS will help your team to thrive.
Hospitality
Stay ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving landscape of hospitality. From customer service and sales enablement through to employee engagement, you'll find every solution you need within Thrive.
Healthcare
Transform your health provision with an industry-leading LMS that can help to provide tailored training pathways, advance medical skills, ensure quality care, and foster innovation for better patient outcomes.
Gaming
Utilise the world's fastest-growing LMS to help ensure your learners are up to speed with the latest storytelling trends, tech innovations, and news within the gaming industry.
Integrations
Connected in every way to sync into your current workflow

Onboarding
Step into a new seamless era of onboarding, guided by user-tailored learning pathways that unlock your team's potential from day one. Simplify training, captivate new hires, and nurture long term potential.
Hundreds of companies.
99% customer retention.
Make onboarding effortless
Simplify your onboarding process with our user-friendly LMS. Our intuitive interface and guides ensure a smooth setup, and our vast array of integrations allow you to seamlessly integrate with other existing HR tools. From importing data to configuring courses, our streamlined approach gets your team up and running quickly.
Tailored learning paths for success
Empower learners with personalised training paths, and nurture talent from day one by driving a culture of continuous learning within your organisation. With Thrive, you can customise journeys for specific roles, departments or skills. Keep your people engaged with enjoyable courses containing interactive modules, quizzes and multimedia content.
Tailored learning paths for success
Empower learners with personalised training paths, and nurture talent from day one by driving a culture of continuous learning within your organisation. With Thrive, you can customise journeys for specific roles, departments or skills. Keep your people engaged with enjoyable courses containing interactive modules, quizzes and multimedia content.
Smart insights for informed decisions
Get data-driven insights via our reporting suite. Track progress, engagement, and completion rates in real-time. Using Thrive, you can effectively refine your L&D strategy and enhance your team's training effectiveness. From individual performance to organisational goals, our insights optimise employee onboarding for lasting success.
â
What does good employee onboarding look like? Bally's answered this question with the help of Thrive. Doing away with previously long and tedious introductions, the online gaming company used their all-in-one learning platform to create a new type of first impression. New hires are now greeted with a personalised onboarding pathway to help them get up to speed quickly, and as a result, Bally's have reduced onboarding time by 40%.

Compliance training
Itâs time to modernise compliance training. Seamlessly automate all of your essential learning, and show your organisation is compliant with real-time reporting and demonstrable adherence to industry standards.
Hundreds of companies.
99% customer retention.
Compliance training made easy
Navigating regulatory complexities is effortless with our compliance training solution. Our tailored learning paths, module creation and real-time progress updates simplify the process. Equip your team with the knowledge they need to uphold regulations effectively and foster a compliant work environment. With our user-friendly platform, ensuring regulatory compliance has never been easier.
Tailored learning paths
Meet your organisation's unique compliance needs with personalised customisable learning paths. Thrive lets you create modules that align with your requirements, whether for onboarding, ongoing development or educating your team on new legislation.Â
Easily deliver essential learning courses and automate reminders to let your teams know what needs to be completed, and what might be overdue. What's more, personalised learning pathways help your organisation adhere to regulations by keeping everyone in the know.
Tailored learning paths
Meet your organisation's unique compliance needs with personalised customisable learning paths. Thrive lets you create modules that align with your requirements, whether for onboarding, ongoing development or educating your team on new legislation.Â
Easily deliver essential learning courses and automate reminders to let your teams know what needs to be completed, and what might be overdue. What's more, personalised learning pathways help your organisation adhere to regulations by keeping everyone in the know.
Real-time progress updates
Track compliance training progress in real time. Our intuitive LMS lets you identify completed modules and areas needing attention with easy-to-use dashboards, helping you stayÂ proactive in ensuring compliance across your organisation by addressing gaps promptly.
Elevate your compliance training strategy today with our streamlined solutions. Stay informed, mitigate risks, and foster a culture of compliance within your workforce.
How do you make compliance training fun? It's the question that has plagued L&D professionals for years, and
Middlesbrough College
found their answer in Thrive. The College were searching for a new digital learning solution that would get new staff up to speed fast, deliver engaging compliance training that worked, and support continued professional development. Together with Thrive, they overhauled their existing process and replaced it with engaging learning pathways -- resulting in 100% completion of compliance courses.

Sales enablement
Equip your sales teams with an industry-leading platform that gives them the skills they need to confidently capture critical sales moments.
Hundreds of companies.
99% customer retention.
Improve sales performanceÂ
Unlock the potential of your sales teams with our state-of-the-art LMS. Thrive offers a comprehensive collection of features designed to elevate your sales training programs. Equip your sales representatives with the knowledge and skills they need to excel, no matter your industry.
Effortlessly create, deliver, and track training content tailored to your company's unique products, services, and sales methodologies. This enables your team to engage their clients effectively, tackle objections with confidence, and achieve higher success rates in closing deals and driving revenue.
Streamline onboarding and cultivate continuous learning
Efficiently onboard new sales hires and provide seamless ongoing training. Say goodbye to time-consuming, manual onboarding processes and discover a new way of doing things. Thrive enables you to create structured learning pathways that guide new hires through essential product knowledge, sales techniques and company processes. Spend less money on onboarding, accelerate time-to-competency, and upskill faster with Thrive.
Promote a culture of continuous learning by offering a resource library thatâs accessible anytime, anywhere. Whether it's refining negotiation skills, understanding new product features, or staying current with industry trends, our industry-leading LMS ensures your sales team remains at the forefront, ready to adapt to evolving customer needs.
Streamline onboarding and cultivate continuous learning
Efficiently onboard new sales hires and provide seamless ongoing training. Say goodbye to time-consuming, manual onboarding processes and discover a new way of doing things. Thrive enables you to create structured learning pathways that guide new hires through essential product knowledge, sales techniques and company processes. Spend less money on onboarding, accelerate time-to-competency, and upskill faster with Thrive.
Promote a culture of continuous learning by offering a resource library thatâs accessible anytime, anywhere. Whether it's refining negotiation skills, understanding new product features, or staying current with industry trends, our industry-leading LMS ensures your sales team remains at the forefront, ready to adapt to evolving customer needs.
Measure and optimise performance
Gain insights into your sales team's performance with our advanced analytics and reporting features. Our all-in-one LMS tracks user engagement, completion rates, and skill gaps, providing valuable data to evaluate training effectiveness.
Identify top-performing individuals and pinpoint areas for improvement, then fine-tune your training content accordingly. This data-driven approach allows you to optimise your sales training strategy, resulting in a more agile, adaptable, and successful sales team.
Ann Summers
used Thrive to learn how to do sales enablement right. With the help of Thrive's vast array of content options, they created a dynamic, blended learning programme for their sales staff. They knew that more in-depth learning led to better sales, but now they had Thrive's data and analytics functionality to back it up. Through an experimental blended learning programme that utilised Thrive's sales enablement capabilities, Ann Summers saw a 10% increase in sales for their "Buzz Fresh" and hosiery product lines.
â

Communication
No matter where your teams are based, Thrive ensures you have the ability to deliver seamless critical communication, helping you foster a collaborative digital community within your organisation.
Hundreds of companies.
99% customer retention.
Activity feeds and instant updates
Keep your workforce engaged and informed using our all-in-one LMS's activity feeds and real-time announcements. Broadcast company news, events, and team updates directly to personalised feeds. Encourage cohesion as employees react, comment, and connect over the latest information.
Whether it's a company-wide announcement or a team-specific update, our platform ensures that every member of your organisation remains up-to-date.
Recognise success with kudos
Create a culture of appreciation through our kudos and recognition features. Celebrate milestones and achievements publicly, fostering motivation and teamwork. Strengthen employee satisfaction and retention by fostering an environment of acknowledgment.
Whether it's hitting a milestone, completing a project, or demonstrating exceptional teamwork, our platform provides a space to acknowledge these successes.
Recognise success with kudos
Create a culture of appreciation through our kudos and recognition features. Celebrate milestones and achievements publicly, fostering motivation and teamwork. Strengthen employee satisfaction and retention by fostering an environment of acknowledgment.
Whether it's hitting a milestone, completing a project, or demonstrating exceptional teamwork, our platform provides a space to acknowledge these successes.
Connect with internal mentors
Elevate professional growth by linking employees with internal mentors. Using Thrive, you can seamlessly connect people so that mentees can gain invaluable insights from experienced professionals within your organisation. Our integrated messaging and scheduling tools simplify mentorship, allowing employees to foster valuable relationships that enable personal learning growth.
Unlock the potential of your workforce by enabling them to tap into the wisdom and experience of mentors right within the Learning Platform.

Customer service training
Your customerâs success is your success. Empower and equip your support teams to provide the best customer experience possible.
Hundreds of companies.
99% customer retention.
Increase customer retention
Elevate customer satisfaction and increase retention with Thrive. Empower your customer service teams with cutting-edge insights and knowledge to bolster their performance.Â
From learning pathways at onboarding to content learning modules on the job, Thrive serves as an all-inclusive hub for your team. Identify skill gaps, provide content, and offer seamless communication to your team. This will ensure they remain informed and able to replicate the same level of attentiveness with your valued customers.
Solutions for frontline staff
â
Equip your storefront staff with comprehensive learning through the Thrive app. Tailored modules and expert-guided pathways enable team members to access a wealth of knowledge aimed at enhancing customer interactions, whether over the phone or in-store. Our app offers a rich ecosystem where real-world scenarios are simulated, allowing for practical, hands-on learning. With Thrive, teams stay agile and excel in customer interactions.
Solutions for frontline staff
â
Equip your storefront staff with comprehensive learning through the Thrive app. Tailored modules and expert-guided pathways enable team members to access a wealth of knowledge aimed at enhancing customer interactions, whether over the phone or in-store. Our app offers a rich ecosystem where real-world scenarios are simulated, allowing for practical, hands-on learning. With Thrive, teams stay agile and excel in customer interactions.
Prove the ROI of your team's learning
Seeking a smooth correlation between learning and performance? Thrive seamlessly integrates into your tech stack, unveiling the link between top-tier customer service agents and their passion for continuous learning and advancement. See how engaged learning translates into tangible business outcomes with data-driven insights.

Skills development
Put the power in the hands of your learners. Thrive will help you build an organic skills strategy from the ground up, giving you a truly holistic view of the skills within - or missing from - your business.
Hundreds of companies.
99% customer retention.
Tailored skill development paths
Thrive empowers you to offer personalised skill development solutions. Create the perfect learning journey with assessments and analytics to pinpoint your team's strengths and areas for improvement. Make sure your team is continually on the path to personal and professional growth. With a vast library of modules and resources at your disposal, you can curate a curriculum that caters to every learning style, schedule, and career objective.
â
Progress monitoring
Thrive lets you effortlessly track your team's progress. With real-time analytics and reporting, you can identify skill gaps, celebrate milestones, and adapt your strategy as needed. For organisations, our platform provides valuable insights to enhance team capabilities and drive continuous improvement. Stay on the path to success with data-driven skill development.
Detailed insights into your team's learning journey allow you to adapt and refine each individual's skill development strategy. This, in turn, ensures that everyone remains on the path to success and never stops upskilling.
Progress monitoring
Thrive lets you effortlessly track your team's progress. With real-time analytics and reporting, you can identify skill gaps, celebrate milestones, and adapt your strategy as needed. For organisations, our platform provides valuable insights to enhance team capabilities and drive continuous improvement. Stay on the path to success with data-driven skill development.
Detailed insights into your team's learning journey allow you to adapt and refine each individual's skill development strategy. This, in turn, ensures that everyone remains on the path to success and never stops upskilling.
Interactive and immersive learning
Learning should never feel like a chore, which is why our revolutionary platform seamlessly combines the advantages of both an LMS and an LXP into one game-changing platform. This unique blend enables you to deliver and emphasise captivating and interactive content as a top priority.
Say goodbye to dull lectures and endless slideshows. Our skill development solutions leverage multimedia elements, gamification, simulations, and hands-on exercises to make learning not only effective but also enjoyable. Whether you're delving into coding, leadership, or a specialised field, our immersive approach ensures that every moment counts.
â

All the learning content you need,
with an
extra
pair of hands.
Ready-made elearning that upskills your teams with thousands of sector-specific resources,
pre-made pathways and a service that fills your content gaps.
What is Thrive Content?
Upskill your teams with thousands of resources weâll map for you
Your one-stop e-learning powerhouse complete with sector specific courses, expertly crafted learning pathways and a service that effortlessly fills your content gaps. Unlock thousands of uniquely designed resources covering valuable topics such as health & safety, leadership, communication, information security, mental wellness, compliance and beyond.
Watch video
Core Content
The only content partner you need.
Explore topics
Download topics list
Our Core Content covers all the topics your learners need to know, so you donât have to spend time managing multiple providers.
Slide 1
Compliance
Ensure your team's compliance and protect your organisation with Thrive Content's Compliance topic, containing resources on business ethics, anti-bribery & corruption, money laundering and many more.
Customer service
Help your team understand every facet of serving the public with our Customer Service topic, packed with easy-to-digest information on politeness, dealing with angry customers, understanding customer needs and much more.
Mental health and well-being
Our carefully curated Mental Health and Wellbeing topic offers a wide array of insights, tips and practices for both individuals and organisations. Enhance you and your team's wellbeing and promote a happier, healthier lifestyle with this insightful set of resources.
Health and safety
Thrive Content's comprehensive Health and Safety topic is designed to empower individuals and organisations with the knowledge they need to create safe and healthy environments. From risk assessment to first aid and fire safety, we equip you with the essential information to ensure the well-being of yourself and those around you.
Employee experience
Packed with insights for both managers and employees, Thrive's Employee Experience topic offers over 100 resources on everything from strategic thinking and teamwork to neurodiversity and allyship. Have your employees at the heart of everything you do, and create a harmonious workplace where everyone can thrive.
DEI
At Thrive, we understand the immense value that diversity brings to any organisation. Our DEI topic is designed to empower you with the knowledge, skills, and strategies needed to create an inclusive environment that fosters innovation, collaboration, and overall growth.
Cyber information and security
Our Cyber Information and Security topic is the complete guide to fortifying your digital presence. We equip you with indispensable knowledge that covers a range of crucial subjects - from deciphering cyber security jargon to mastering the art of safe social media use.
Leadership & management
Thrive Contentâs thorough Leadership & Management topic is designed to equip managers with the essential knowledge needed to lead through change, drive innovation, hire effectively and foster a culture of trust.
World of work
Covering subjects from brainstorming and teamwork to building your professional network and feedback management, our World of Work topic offers a thoughtfully curated collection of resources to support your teams on their professional journeys.
Communication skills
From the basics of communication to the importance of building rapport, Thrive Content will show your team how to handle every aspect of the conversation with ease.
Sectors suites
Sector-savvy learning libraries
Explore Sector Suites
Looking for something industry-tailored? Explore relevant content on tomorrowâs must-have skills in the world you operate in. Our sector-specific suites are complete with all the titles you need to equip your entire workforce with the knowledge to grow and evolve.
Retail
The Retail sector presents unique challenges, which is why Thrive has curated a collection of resources designed specifically for the industry. Designed with the support of Ted Baker and Ann Summers, our Retail sector content covers a wide range of subjects, from understanding consumer behaviour to mastering customer service.
Professional Services
Our Professional Services sector suite provides your consultants with comprehensive resources covering data, digital transformation, and technical skills, enabling them to thrive in the Professional Services sector.
Public Sector
Thrive's Public Sector content suite offers a wealth of sector-specific resources to support your team, covering everything from GDPR to project planning. Expedite your team's learning process with our pre-made pathways in crucial domains like UK legislation and education.
Hospitality
Provide your Hospitality teams with the knowledge they need to deliver amazing guest experiences, with Thrive's industry-tailored content covering all aspects of customer service and operations management. Elevate your workforce and leave a lasting impression on every guest.
Financial Services
Our specialised Financial Services content covers a variety of key areas including anti-bribery and corruption, GDPR compliance, cybersecurity, and building rapport in sales. Provide your people with the essential knowledge they need to be able to identify and mitigate risks, increase sales and thrive as a team.
Food & Drink Manufacturing
Thrive's Food and Drink Manufacturing content suite provides your team with the essential information they need to excel. Our resources, designed with the help of St. Austell's Brewery and Butternut Box, cover everything from hygiene standards to managing production site security.

FAQS
All your answers upfront
How many resources do I get with Thrive Content?
Thrive Content is the only learning partner you need with thousands of learning resources that come with our Core Content offering full of your business-essentials. Each Sector Suite then has an additional 200+ resources which are business-critical to their relevant industries.
How long does Thrive Content take to implement?
Onboarding can take anything between 1-4 weeks. Based on your business-requirements, our team will work with you to map our content resources to your learning initiatives, campaigns and objectives. This usually speeds up the implementation process and saves you mapping out what to prioritise for your learners.
Is there an onboarding, workshop or migration fee?
Absolutely not. We hate hidden surprises, so there is no extra cost to go through onboarding, attend workshops for no extra cost.
What content types does Thrive Content support?
Our resources come in a variety of formats, from SCORM elearning packages, podcasts, videos, infographics, audio, TikTok, articles and PDF guides.
What languages does Thrive Content support?
We offer Thrive Content in English, German, French, Spanish and Italian. Other languages are available on request and at a charge.

Core Content
Our Core Content library has all the resources you need, with an unrivalled wrap-around service.
Explore the core topics you can unlock when you subscribe today.
Download topics list
Meet your new elearning partner.
Unlock thousands of uniquely designed resources covering valuable topics such as health & safety, leadership, communication, information security, mental wellness, compliance and beyond.
Compliance
Ensure your team's compliance and protect your organisation with Thrive Content's Compliance topic, containing resources on business ethics, anti-bribery & corruption, money laundering and many more.
Customer service
Help your team understand every facet of serving the public with our Customer Service topic, packed with easy-to-digest information on politeness, dealing with angry customers, understanding customer needs and much more.
Mental health and well-being
Our carefully curated Mental Health and Wellbeing topic offers a wide array of insights, tips and practices for both individuals and organisations. Enhance you and your team's wellbeing and promote a happier, healthier lifestyle with this insightful set of resources.
Health and safety
Thrive Content's comprehensive Health and Safety topic is designed to empower individuals and organisations with the knowledge they need to create safe and healthy environments. From risk assessment to first aid and fire safety, we equip you with the essential information to ensure the well-being of yourself and those around you.
Employee experience
Packed with insights for both managers and employees, Thrive's Employee Experience topic offers over 100 resources on everything from strategic thinking and teamwork to neurodiversity and allyship. Have your employees at the heart of everything you do, and create a harmonious workplace where everyone can thrive.
DEI
At Thrive, we understand the immense value that diversity brings to any organisation. Our DEI topic is designed to empower you with the knowledge, skills, and strategies needed to create an inclusive environment that fosters innovation, collaboration, and overall growth.
Cyber information and security
Our Cyber Information and Security topic is the complete guide to fortifying your digital presence. We equip you with indispensable knowledge that covers a range of crucial subjects - from deciphering cyber security jargon to mastering the art of safe social media use.
Leadership & management
Thrive Contentâs thorough Leadership & Management topic is designed to equip managers with the essential knowledge needed to lead through change, drive innovation, hire effectively and foster a culture of trust.
World of work
Covering subjects from brainstorming and teamwork to building your professional network and feedback management, our World of Work topic offers a thoughtfully curated collection of resources to support your teams on their professional journeys.
Communication skills
From the basics of communication to the importance of building rapport, Thrive Content will show your team how to handle every aspect of the conversation with ease.
Discover Thrive Content
Upskill your teams with thousands of resources weâll map for you.
Request a content trial

Sector Suites
Our sector-specific suites are complete with all the topics your teams need for success in your industry.
Sector suite list
Weâve taken our experience of working with over 350 trailblazing enterprises including John Lewis, Nando's, Royal Mail, DPD, Specsavers, PwC, and Primark to curate the perfect set of content topics for key sectors.
Retail
The Retail sector presents unique challenges, which is why Thrive has curated a collection of resources designed specifically for the industry. Designed with the support of Ted Baker and Ann Summers, our Retail sector content covers a wide range of subjects, from understanding consumer behaviour to mastering customer service.
Professional Services
Our Professional Services sector suite provides your consultants with comprehensive resources covering data, digital transformation, and technical skills, enabling them to thrive in the Professional Services sector.
Public Sector
Thrive's Public Sector content suite offers a wealth of sector-specific resources to support your team, covering everything from GDPR to project planning. Expedite your team's learning process with our pre-made pathways in crucial domains like UK legislation and education.
Hospitality
Provide your Hospitality teams with the knowledge they need to deliver amazing guest experiences, with Thrive's industry-tailored content covering all aspects of customer service and operations management. Elevate your workforce and leave a lasting impression on every guest.
Financial Services
Our specialised Financial Services content covers a variety of key areas including anti-bribery and corruption, GDPR compliance, cybersecurity, and building rapport in sales. Provide your people with the essential knowledge they need to be able to identify and mitigate risks, increase sales and thrive as a team.
Food & Drink Manufacturing
Thrive's Food and Drink Manufacturing content suite provides your team with the essential information they need to excel. Our resources, designed with the help of St. Austell's Brewery and Butternut Box, cover everything from hygiene standards to managing production site security.
Discover Thrive Content
Upskill your teams with thousands of resources weâll map for you.

Thrive Content service
Never left to navigate alone
Weâll never wave you off, only to speak again at your renewal stage. With Thrive Content you will experience the power of our wrap-around service and dedicated support.Â
With your very own CSM (Customer Success Manager) and Content Expert, weâll help you map your new content alongside your existing offering, plan learning initiatives and bridge skill gaps via roadmap requests that our whole Content Community will benefit from. This frees you up to focus on the important stuff.
Content Community
Always better together
Whether itâs staying ahead of industry trends or collaborating with other L&D leaders within our network, the Content Community is a content-exclusive platform that will empower you and your teams to make even more impact within your learning strategy.
Engage in monthly webinars and community discussions, and thrive through interactive workshops and real-life round tables. Itâs the only off-the-shelf learning provider that will amplify your voice, act on feedback and empower customers to set the direction of Thrive Content.
What you'll get
A content library packed full of serviceÂ
At our core is creating the industry's best customer experience. Hereâs how we do it.Â
Meet the team
Storytellers and success strategists
Working alongside you is an award-winning team of creatives and content strategists. This talented team is eager to elevate engagement, well-versed in crafting campaigns and passionate about igniting meaningful conversations that create change for the better.

FAQS
All your answers upfront
How many resources do I get with Thrive Content?
Thrive Content is the only learning partner you need with thousands of learning resources that come with our Core Content offering full of your business-essentials. Each Sector Suite then has an additional 200+ resources which are business-critical to their relevant industries.
What content types does Thrive Content support?
Our resources come in a variety of formats, from SCORM elearning packages, podcasts, videos, infographics, audio, TikTok, articles and PDF guides.
How long does Thrive Content take to implement?
Onboarding can take anything between 1-4 weeks. Based on your business-requirements, our team will work with you to map our content resources to your learning initiatives, campaigns and objectives. This usually speeds up the implementation process and saves you mapping out what to prioritise for your learners.
Is there an onboarding, workshop or migration fee?
Absolutely not. We hate hidden surprises, so there is no extra cost to go through onboarding, attend workshops for no extra cost.
What languages does Thrive Content support?
We offer Thrive Content in English, German, French, Spanish and Italian. Other languages are available on request and at a charge.

Custom content
Picture this: We're your personal learning content creators. Crafting, designing, and mapping tailor-made learning experiences right to your learner's digital doorstep.
Customised learning experience:
because sometimes one size canât fit all
Upskill, onboard and train your teams with Thrive Custom Content: your personal learning designers, building the tailor-made learning experiences your business needs right on your learning platform.
Whether itâs onboarding, product knowledge or leadership training, sometimes a personalised programme that understands your unique brand, culture and challenges is the answer. Thatâs why we've created Thrive Custom Content.
Feature Heighlights
This is not the typical 45-minute SCORM course you're used to seeing. Our approach considers the entire learning experience, crafting micro-resources that your people actually want to engage with. Audio stories, video shoots, elearning and quizzes make up a dynamic learning journey that compels your teams from start to finish.
Feature Heighlights
A 45-minute SCORM
course is never the answer
When you think of custom content, the image of a tedious 45-minute "click-next" elearning module comes to mind, right? Not with Thrive.
Our expert and trusted team thinks differently. This fresh take on customised digital content turns traditional learning design on its head.
We'll take your learning plans and programmes, break them down, and transform them into captivating learning journeys. Dividing up those chunky content topics, we seamlessly map out a learning journey bursting with bite-size, digestible and compelling content resources.
Building your learning programme
The way your custom learning experience takes shape is completely up to you and the behaviours youâre looking to change, but hereâs a shopping list to give you an idea of whatâs up for grabs:
Animation
10 minute Storyline modules
Video shoots and photo shoots
Booklets and guides
Quizzes
Refresher resources
Audio stories
Learning campaign assets
Practical tasks
Content uploaded and mapped on Thrive
See it in action
A
thriving
approach to
Custom Content
Looking for a bespoke partnership thatâs straightforward, creative and impactful?
With Thrive Custom Content, itâs easy to outsource your tailor-made learning programmes and turn them into on-brand, microlearning experiences that get your learners excited.
The process is simple.
01
Kick-off
Weâll work together to define your challenges and understand the need.
02
Content workshop
Brainstorming ideas, concept creation and strategy programming.
03
Scripting, designing and voiceovers
The creative part!
04
Branded working prototypes
Youâll get something real to play around with.
05
Alpha and beta reviews
Feedback and any rounds of amends.
06
Content mapping
Weâll build out the learning journey directly on Thrive using pathways.
07
All source files provided
We'll never leave you in the lurch. Youâll get full access to everything we create together.
08
Thrive Impact Assessment
Weâll work together to review your new learning experiences and measure ROI.
Custom Content
Find out today how our Custom Content works perfectly alongside our industry-leading platform.

Reiss
The luxury clothing company tailors their learning strategy with Thrive.
In todayâs world of fast fashion and rapidly changing micro-trends, Reiss Clothing recalls a time when the emphasis was on quality over quantity. Staying true to its origin as a luxury mensâ retailer while they expanded, Reiss has never wavered on their mission to deliver âattainable luxuryâ to everyone from high street shoppers, to celebrities, to royalty. Their offering now comprises menswear, womenswear, childrenswear and accessories, with stores across the UK, Europe, North America, the United Arab Emirates, Australia and Canada.

From off-brand to on-point
Prior to partnering with Thrive, Reissâ learning platform was extremely limited in terms of functionality, and it simply didnât inspire them. With their teamâs professional progression at the top of their priority list, they had no choice but to search for a new vendor.
They had a few concerns when it came to switching learning platform providers; most importantly, the smooth migration of their learning data.
And unsurprisingly, there was plenty of data to migrate.
Reiss is a global operation, with 1,600 members of staff spread out across retail and head office locations. In looking to leave behind the platform they had now outgrown, it was absolutely essential to Reiss that their next vendor have the capacity to handle a large migration in a smooth and stress-free way.
This is when their research brought them to Thrive: The all-in-one, AI-powered
LMS
with a proven track record of successful
implementations
for teams of all sizes.

in the first month

Finding their signature style
Just like crafting a luxurious capsule wardrobe full of beautiful pieces (something Reiss knows all about) planning the first steps of an effective learning strategy requires you to decide exactly what your priorities are.
So other than a smooth implementation, which is a
must
for any impactful learning platform transition, what was important to the team at Reiss?
â
Career progression:
Career progression was a huge priority for Reiss. They wanted to ensure that every single member of staff felt valued and nurtured in their roles, and that they had all the tools they needed to succeed.
Why Thrive?
With advanced â
Skills and Goals
â functionality, Thriveâs customisable platform is designed with learners in mind. They can select the areas of progression that theyâre interested in, and Thrive will create a custom learning pathway to help them reach their goals.
â
â
Faster onboarding:
Prior to launching Thrive, one of Reissâ pain points was the time it took to onboard new starters. In making the transition, they wanted to prevent this process needlessly eating into time employees could be spending getting to grips with their roles.
Why Thrive?
With seamless onboarding pathways that can be tailored to each learner, role, department or organisation, Thrive is designed to make employeesâ introductions to the company as efficient and effective as possible.
A simplified tech stack:
Instead of having their comms and learning spread out across multiple platforms, it was important to have everything consolidated in one central place.
Why Thrive?
Thriveâs all-in-one LMS combines skills, learning and comms in one intuitive platform and offers hundreds of integrations â perfect for consolidating your tech stack.
â
A sense of belonging and collaboration:
Reiss wanted to develop a deeper sense of belonging amongst their people, celebrate their differences, and increase collaboration throughout the business.
Why Thrive?
Thriveâs all-in-one platform encourages collaboration with
communication
features that are designed to bring people together. This is enhanced by
Thrive Content
: the off-the-shelf service that provides hundreds of thoroughly-researched resources on belonging, inclusion, allyship and more.
â
â
A boutique learning experience
What does a timeless outfit have in common with an effective learning platform? Sometimes, simplicity is key. This is exactly what Reiss aimed for when launching Thrive: One, simplified central place where all their learning and comms could be stored â and that goal has already been realised.
On top of this, within just a few months of launch Reissâ initial objectives of faster onboarding, career progression and belonging are starting to fall into place.
Having left their previous platform behind, Reiss is ready to Â fully lean into Thriveâs AI capabilities, and make use of the new suite of tools and features. The AI search function and WhatsApp coach will deliver dynamic and instant answers instantly â so their people can spend less time searching, and more time progressing in their roles.
Meanwhile, the AI authoring tool will allow their admins to create unique learning content in multiple formats within a few clicks.

Science Museum Group
Science Museum Group upgrades from classroom-based learning to an innovative digital L&D strategy, enjoying a 25% uptake in training workshops as a result.
Science Museum Group is the worldâs biggest collection of science museums, comprising the Science Museum of London, the National Science and Museum in Bradford, the Science and Industry Museum in Manchester, and the Science and Innovation Park in Wiltshire. Their collection spans science, technology, engineering and medicine, and welcomes over five million visitors every year. Theyâre in the business of sharing knowledge with the public - so of course, they also need to deliver that same promise to their thousands of employees.
User Licenses

Redefining learning
Prior to Thrive, Science Museum Groupâs learning engagement was in need of a new definition.
âLearningâ was a word that only described the mandatory training that employees had to log on and complete once a year, and âadditional trainingâ referred simply to a traditional, classroom-based approach facilitated by expensive external trainers.
The SMG team needed to shift their peopleâs perception of what learning could mean, be, and do for them. As a group that prides themselves on inspiration and education for everyone, the unengaging L&D strategy wasnât going to cut it moving forwards.
In searching for a new learning platform, SMG was looking to modernise and create value for money. But more importantly, they wanted a real culture change; to create a strategy that saw people actively take control of their own learning.
â
Content
114
different training workshop topics

â
As easy as choosing a movie
So, out of all the learning platforms out there - and there are plenty - what ultimately led Science Museum Group to choose Thrive? There were a few reasons, the first being the fact that the platform was so easy to use.
Klaudia Mitura
(L&D Manager at Science Museum Group) knew that the group needed something that would feel seamless for their team, echoing the digital apps like Amazon and Netflix that people use every day. The team wanted learning that was as easy, accessible and intuitive as choosing what to watch on the TV.
Thriveâs modern, agile interface filled that gap perfectly.
The second reason was the sheer range of learning opportunities within Thrive. With establishing a new learning culture as their primary objective, SMG knew that their teams would respond well to accessible micro-moments of learning that they could complete in the flow of work.
Their compliance training and onboarding procedures would also get a shake-up, resulting in a bigger impact on the business as a whole.
â
Back-end support for the Front of House
The well-oiled machine of Science Museum Group runs so smoothly thanks in part to their 120-strong customer-facing team: A department that serves as the face of the operation and interacts with hundreds of visitors every single day. This team deserved their own unique learning strategy running alongside the company-wide learning to help them excel within their roles, and deliver world-class customer service.
The Front of House team is headed up by
Paige
(Assistant Visitor Experience Manager.) Sheâs taken Thriveâs capabilities and run with them, recognising that the bite-sized, micro modules are the perfect size to jump into between customers. There are a few innovative elements of Thrive that have resulted in a successful training strategy, and more staff members than ever being fully up-to-date:
â
1.
Standardisation of training:
The
onboarding pathways
provided by Thrive result in a standardisation of training across the whole team. Paige can be sure that every member of staff is coming to their additional training with a solid foundation, having completed the same onboarding pathway as a new starter.
2.
Managersâ View:
The
Managerâs View
feature allows Paige (and all SMG managers) a holistic view of their teamâs individual progress. They can easily see who has completed their training, along with a total percentage of completion across the entire team, and how to achieve 100%.
3. Customer service:
The core of Paigeâs team and role at SMG. Paige has utilised Thriveâs pathway functionality to create an insightful
customer service training
programme titled âInspiring Service.â This provides new starters with standardised customer service training that has been crafted with SMG visitors in mind, helping Front of House to deliver customer-led, visitor-focused service to everyone who walks through their doors.
â
â
A curated L&D strategy
This purposeful, curated learning strategy has led to results that SMG can feel proud of. Hereâs just a few ways Thrive has impacted the SMG team:
â
1. User Generated Content:
Science Museum Group has fully embraced Thriveâs UGC capabilities, with 39 collaborations between 110+ content experts. Together, these internal Subject Matter Experts have been able to share their knowledge with the entire organisation.
2. ROI:
SMG has seen some incredible return on investment for their Learning & Development offering. They can use Thriveâs
Skills and Goals
feature to capture learning needs across the organisation; effortlessly detecting skills and knowledge gaps in teams, and for individuals. Theyâve done away with the expensive external trainers and classroom-style learning, doing a big favour for their bottom line.
3. Engagement:
Thrive has served as a massive boon to Science Museum Groupâs learning culture. There is a monthly average of over 8,000 pieces of content being accessed, a quarter of which are non-mandatory learning. The learners are benefiting hugely from this culture shift, and itâs showing no signs of slowing down.

Gemma Islip
Head of Talent and Culture at Science Museum Group
âThe thing I love most about working with Thrive is that we can really see the impact itâs having on our colleagues. Itâs really created excitement around learning, and itâs happening a lot more frequently.â
